/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. Cars and bicycles are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the far distance, majestic mountains rise against the horizon, adding a touch of natural beauty to the urban landscape.
